article.title: M◐◑N DAYS — a web app for creating lunar calendar events
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: My dad celebrates his birthday according to the Chinese calendar, but calendar apps don't support recurring lunisolar events.

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai
